Combat
Hit Points: 183 Initiative: +0 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +14/+12/+14 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +12/22
Armor Proficiency: Medium Shield Proficiency: Heavy Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Bardiche (+8 d10-2 x2@19); Light Hammer (+8 d4-2 x2@20 R20'); Spiked Armor (+8 d6-2 x2@20); Unarmed (+12 d3-2 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Bardiche: -4 attack
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Light Hammer: -4 attack
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Spiked Armor: -4 attack
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Bane: Self gains +2 attack and +2d6 HP damage with chosen weapon vs. chosen creature type for 10 rd/dy
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Requires no skill check to move full speed when blinded
Hand Of The Acolyte: R30' May make +14 ranged attack w/melee weapon 3/dy
Interstellar Void: R30' Inflicts 10d6 HP cold, fatigued (DC 18 Fort half HP only) 2/dy
Judgment: May pronounce one of these, gaining the specified bonus until combat ends, 4/dy: destruction (+4 weapon damage), healing (regains 4 HP/rd), justice (+3 attack, dbl to confirm crit), piercing (+4 concentration, +4 caster level to overcome spell resistance), protection (+3 AC, dbl vs. confirm crit), purity (+3 saves, dbl vs. curse, disease, and poison), resiliency (gain DR 3/opposed alignment), resistance (resistance 8 to chosen energy), smiting (weapons count as magic, aligned, and adamantine to overcome DR)
Lookout: When an adjacent ally has this feat, may take move and standard actions in the surprise round if both self and ally can act; if only ally can act, self gains a surprise round action after ally
Second Judgment: May use 2 Judgments simultaneously; may change 1 as a swift action
Shield Wall: +1 shield AC bonus when an adjacent ally has this feat and a buckler or light shield; +2 w/a heavy or tower shield
Solo Tactics: All allies are treated as having the same Teamwork feats for determining feat bonuses
Save: Fortitude: +12; Reflex: +6; Will: +14
Save Notes: Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +2
Magic
Spell Slots: Domain1: 1; Domain2: 1; Domain3: 1; Domain4: 1; Domain5: 1; Inquisitor0: 6; Inquisitor1: 5; Inquisitor2: 4; Inquisitor3: 3; Inquisitor4: 1; O0: 9; O1: 7; O2: 7; O3: 7; O4: 5; O5: 3 Spell DC: Domain: 10; Inquisitor: 10; O: 13
Spells:
Banish Seeming (Inquisitor3 Abju): Touch gives +2 Dispel Magic effects vs. 2 illusions or reverts magical transformations (check vs. target HD) for 10 rd
Borrow Fortune (O3 Evoc): Self gains better of two immediate d20 rolls, then suffers worse of two d20 rolls for 2 rd
Brand (Inquisitor0 Tran): Inflicts 1 HP on touched to etch indelible mark (DC 10 Fort neg, scraping to remove inflicts 1d6 HP and brand reappears if healed) for 10 dy
Burst Bonds (Inquisitor1 Evoc): Touched restraints suffer 5d6 HP (DC 11 Fort half (magical restraints)), ignoring hardness up to 10, or self gains free +5 CMB and +5 save attempt to break grapple (DC 11 Fort neg)
Cast Out (Inquisitor3 Abju): Touched suffers 2d8+10 HP and dispel of 2 Magic Jar or enchantment effects (DC 13 Will half HP and 1 effect)
Castigate (Inquisitor2 Ench): R50' Target suffers fear for 10 rd (DC 12 Will ends w/1 rd shaken; worshipers of Nethys save -2)
Commune (Star Chart5 Divi): Deity answers 10 yes/no questions
Confess (Inquisitor2 Ench): R50' Target must answer truthfully one question from self or suffer 5d6 HP and 2d4 rd sickened (DC 12 Will half HP only)
Corruption Resistance (Inquisitor2 Abju): Touched gains DR 10/- vs. chosen alignment magical damage for 100 min
Coward's Lament (Inquisitor4 Ench): R50' Target suffers cumulative -1 AC, attack, and saves/rd (max -5, DC 14 Will neg 1 rd, attacking self resets to 0) for 10 rd
Defile Armor (Inquisitor4 Abju): Touched armor gives +2 AC, plus DR 5/good while using Judgment or Smite for 10 min
Detect Chaos (Detection1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on chaotic auras for conc or 100 min
Detect Evil (Detection1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on evil auras for conc or 100 min
Detect Good (Detection1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on good auras for conc or 100 min
Detect Law (Detection1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on lawful auras for conc or 100 min
Discern Lies (Detection4 Divi): R50' Self detects lies from 10 creatures in 15' radius (DC 17 Will neg) for conc or 10 rd
Dispel Magic (Dispelling Touch3 Abju): R200' Successful d20+10 check vs. 11+caster level cancels targeted spell or 1 spell on targeted creature
Divine Vessel (O8 Tran): Self gains size category, +6 Strength, +6 Constitution, +3 AC, 60' Darkvision, SR 22, and alignment-specific effects for 10 rd
Fester (Inquisitor3 Necr): R50' Target suffers SR 22 to spells that grant healing or temporary HP for 10 rd (DC 13 Fort 1 rd)
Flames Of The Faithful (Inquisitor2 Tran): Touched self weapon inflicts +1d6 HP fire (crit while using Judgment also inflicts +1d10 HP fire or more) for 10 rd
Follow Aura (Inquisitor2 Divi): Self can track chosen alignment moderate or strong aura for 100 min
Forced Repentance (Inquisitor4 Ench): R50' Evil target (but not of evil subtype) falls prone and makes confession (DC 14 Will neg) for 10 rd
Greater Brand (Inquisitor4 Tran): Inflicts 1d6 HP on touched to etch permanent indelible mark (DC 14 Fort neg) that glows and sickens when w/in 30' of self faith symbol
Hunter's Eye (Inquisitor3 Divi): R200' Self can see target when invisible or concealed (except by darkness) and gains +20 Perception to locate target for 10 min
Mass Castigate (Inquisitor5 Ench): R200' 10 targets in 15' radius suffer fear for 10 rd (DC 15 Will ends w/1 rd shaken; worshipers of Nethys save -2)
Mass Fester (Inquisitor6 Necr): R50' 10 targets in 15' radius suffer SR 22 to spells that grant healing or temporary HP for 10 rd (DC 16 Fort 1 rd)
Oracle's Burden (O2 Necr): R200' Target suffers self Oracle's Curse effects (DC 15 Will neg) for 10 min
Rebuke (Inquisitor4 Evoc): Foes in 20' radius suffer 5d8 HP (half sonic, half divine) and staggered for 1 rd (worshipers of Nethys 10d6 HP and stunned for 1d4 rd) (DC 14 Fort half HP only)
Resounding Blow (Inquisitor5 Evoc): Hits w/held weapon inflict +1d6 HP sonic, plus staggered 1 rd while using Judgment or Smite (DC 15 Fort neg); crit inflicts stunned 1 rd and deafened 1d6 rd (DC 15 Fort neg), for 10 rd
Retribution (Inquisitor3 Necr): R50' Target who just damaged self suffers -4 attack, skill checks, and ability checks for 10 rd (DC 13 Fort 1 rd; worshipers of Nethys save -2)
Righteous Vigor (Inquisitor3 Ench): Touched gains +1 attack and 1d8 temporary HP from each successful attack (max +4/20 temporary HP; miss resets to +0) for 10 rd
Sanctify Armor (Inquisitor4 Abju): Touched armor gives +2 AC, plus DR 5/evil while using Judgment or Smite, for 10 min
Shared Wrath (Inquisitor4 Ench): 10 targets in 15' radius gain +3 attack, damage, and spell resistance checks vs. targeted foe for 1 min
Sleepwalk (Inquisitor4 Ench): Touched unconscious creature animates and moves at half speed (DC 14 Will neg) for 10 hr
Tireless Pursuers (Inquisitor4 Tran): Self and 3 touched gain half damage from hustling and forced march and ignore travel fatigue for 10 hr
Tireless Pursuit (Inquisitor1 Tran): Self gains half damage from hustling and forced march and ignores travel fatigue for 10 hr
Ward The Faithful (Inquisitor3 Abju): 10' radius around touched gives +2 AC and saves to fellow believers for 100 min
Wrath (Inquisitor1 Ench): Self gains +3 attack, damage, and spell resistance checks vs. targeted foe for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus (Acid) effects
Awesome Display: Treats illusion targets as having 3 fewer HD
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Detect Alignment: May cast Detect Chaos, Detect Good, Detect Evil, Detect Law at will
Discern Lies: May use Discern Lies effects 10 rd/dy
Dispelling Touch: Touch inflicts Dispel Magic 1/dy
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Haunted: Knows Mage Hand, Ghost Sound, Levitate, Minor Image, Telekinesis spells
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Shielded Caster: +4 concentration when an adjacent ally has this feat and no shield, +5 w/a buckler or light shield, +6 w/a heavy or tower shield/Suffer half concentration DC from foe Disruptive or similar feature
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Star Chart: May use Commune effects via 10 min contemplation 1/dy
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
